long_description: Replacement cycling shoe cleats for most Crank Brothers clip-in pedal systems. Made with premium-strength brass for exceptional durability. Offers 6deg of float, with release angles of either 15deg or 20deg. For shoes with 2-hole bolt pattern; compatible with Eggbeaters, Candy, and Mallet pedals. Please note: Quattro pedal adapters available separately.
short_description: Replacement cycling shoe cleats for most Crank Brothers clip-in pedal systems.
